text: Michael Harold Schuler (September 22, 1940 â€“ June 28, 2022) was an American basketball coach in the National Basketball Association (NBA). He was the head coach of the Portland Trail Blazers and Los Angeles Clippers from 1986 to 1992. He won the NBA Coach of the Year Award in 1987. Schuler died on June 28, 2022 in Phoenix, Arizona at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from Ohio
title: Mike Schuler
